  • Method Details

    • isValidCredentials

      public boolean isValidCredentials(String username, String password)
      This method uses the Login_query method to grab a username and password. Then stores them into a statement that eventually returns them as strings.
      Parameters:
      username - takes a username as text input
      password - takes a password as text input

    • loginButtonAction

      public void loginButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method handles the login button action event. When a user clicks on the button it checks the username and password, if valid it will bring them to the main screen
      Parameters:
      event - handles user input from mouse click
      Throws:
      IOException - error handling

    • logLoginActivity

      public void logLoginActivity(String username, boolean isSuccess)
      Logs login activity to a file.
      Parameters:
      username - The username associated with the login attempt.
      isSuccess - Indicates whether the login attempt was successful or not.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes class
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      resourceBundle - specifies resource bundle to be used for localization
      url - resolves location for the object(s)
